title: Rune pages no longer available in store?
body: I was wanting to make a new rune page, and I couldn't not find it in the store anywhere. I looked under every tab, and under the account catergory, and nothing. Did they make it to where you can longer buy more?

replies.body: It's there, just hiding!  When you go to the rune section of the store, there's a drop down menu on the left side.  Change from Show Tier 3 to Show All.  That should make the rune page appear!
